channel.title: Python 4 Porting
channel.description:
Quite a long way off but annoying nonetheless. Python 3 will be deprecated in favor of 4 which is incompatible. It feels like we've just moved off of 2 yesterday.
https://www.preining.info/blog/2019/11/python-3-deprecation-imminent/

Python 3 deprecation imminent

OSS Journal, November 2026. In less than two month, with the end of the year 2026, Python 3 will be deprecated and will not obtain any further security updates. Despite the announcement of deprecation...
